lead_paragraph: A top IOC official renewed his demand Thursday that Japanese organizers further reduce their $18 billion budget ceiling for the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, saying the figure could scare off cities considering bids for future games.

headline.print_headline: IOC: Tokyo's Huge Cost Could Give Wrong Message
headline.main: IOC: Tokyo's Huge Cost Could Give Wrong Message
